type.name: string | number | false
type.description: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.

type.name: (event: React.SyntheticEvent, value: number | string | boolean) => void
type.description: Callback invoked when new value is being set.

type.name: boolean
type.description:
If `true` the selected tab changes on focus. Otherwise it only
changes on activation.

type.name: string | number | false
type.description:
The value of the currently selected `Tab`.
If you don't want any selected `Tab`, you can set this prop to `false`.

type.name:
{
  idPrefix: string | undefined
  value: string | number | false
  onSelected: (e: React.SyntheticEvent, newValue: string | number | false) => void
  orientation?: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'
  direction: 'ltr' | 'rtl' | undefined
  selectionFollowsFocus: boolean | undefined
}
